Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneController
public class BoardController
extends ViewObservable
implements SceneController
This class controls the board scene.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • onConfirm

      private void onConfirm()
      Sens to the server the indexes of the leader cards to discard in the first turn.

    • onCardSelection

      private void onCardSelection​(int index)
      Adds the index of the leader card chosen by the player to the array choice. Sets an image hover the selected card and disables the selected card.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the selected card.

    • updateFirstAction

      public void updateFirstAction​(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Shows the cards possessed by the player. Change the active pane to the FIRST ACTION pane.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - Player's board.

    • onMarketArrowButtonClick

      private void onMarketArrowButtonClick​(int choice, int index)
      Sends to the server a getMarket request.
      Parameters:
      choice - 1 for rows and 2 for columns.
      index - Index of the row/column.

    • updateMarket

      public void updateMarket​(Market m)
      Shows the market on the BOARD pane.
      Parameters:
      m - Market to show.

    • updateDecks

      public void updateDecks​(Decks NewDecks)
      Shows the top cards of the decks on the BOARD pane.
      Parameters:
      NewDecks - Decks to show.

    • onDecksCardSelection

      private void onDecksCardSelection​(Colors colors, int level)
      Selects a card from the decks.Starts the buy action if possible. Saves the color of the card.
      Parameters:
      level - Card's level.
      colors - Card's color.

    • buyCard

      private void buyCard​(Colors colors, int level)
      Buys a card from the decks. Saves the level of the card. Sets the spinners for the buy card action. Asks for payment(ProductionBox pane).
      Parameters:
      level - Card's level.
      colors - Card's color.

    • BaseProduction

      private void BaseProduction()
      Starts a base production action. Sets the spinners for the base production. Asks the output's resource(chooseResource pane).

    • onSpecialProduction

      private void onSpecialProduction​(int index)
      Starts a special production action of a leader card. Sets the spinners for the special production. Asks the output's resource(chooseResource pane).
      Parameters:
      index - Leader card's index.

    • NormalProduction

      private void NormalProduction​(int index)
      Starts a normal production action. Sets the spinners for the normal production. Asks for payment(ProductionBox pane).
      Parameters:
      index - Leader card's index.

    • setSpinnerValue

      private void setSpinnerValue​(int i, int j)
      Sets the value of the spinner in position j according to the value i.
      Parameters:
      i - Number of resource to pay.
      j - Index of the spinner.

    • setFaithCards

      Updates the faith cards for the player number playerNumber.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - Player's number.
      faithPath - FaithPath to show.
      faith1 - First faith card.
      faith2 - Second faith card.
      faith3 - Third faith card.

      Moves the faith cross along the faith path.
      Parameters:
      faithMarker - Marker to move.
      position - Position of the marker.

    • onResourceSelection

      private void onResourceSelection​(Resources resources)
      Select a resource. Asks for payment if the player is doing a special or base production action. Set the Resource from white to a new resource in the temporary storage.
      Parameters:
      resources - Resource selected.

    • askResource

      public void askResource​(boolean visible)

      Parameters:

    • viewBoard

      private void viewBoard​(boolean flag)
      Exchange between the player board and the board, if flag is false. Exchange between the First action and the board, if flag is true.
      Parameters:
      flag - False if we already did the first action.

    • showBoard

      public void showBoard()

    • activeBotActions

      Parameters:

    • activeDecks

      public void activeDecks​(boolean active)
      Active the decks.
      Parameters:
      active - True for activating the decks.

    • activeProductions

      public void activeProductions​(boolean active)
      Active the productions.
      Parameters:
      active - True for activating the productions.

    • notInTurn

      public void notInTurn​(boolean active)
      Disables everything if the player is not in turn.
      Parameters:
      active - True to disable everything.

    • showCommunication

      public void showCommunication​(java.lang.String communication, boolean visible)
      Show communications.
      Parameters:
      visible - True if ti's visible.
      communication - Communication to sets.
